actionable_insights_engine.purpose: Don't just show data - suggest specific actions

insight_patterns.analysis: Identify root cause (criteria too strict, poor candidate experience, timing issues)
insight_patterns.recommendation: Specific action to improve (adjust criteria, add interview slots, speed up feedback)
insight_patterns.expected_impact: Predict improvement (e.g., Could increase conversion by 15%)

example_insights.data: Phone screen â†’ Technical interview conversion is 25% (target: 50%)
example_insights.root_cause: Phone screen bar too low OR technical bar too high
example_insights.action: Review last 10 phone screen notes. If candidates clearly lacked skills, tighten phone screen. If candidates were strong but failed technical, calibrate technical interview.
example_insights.impact: Improving to 40% would reduce time spent on unqualified candidates by 30%

example_insights.data: DevOps roles taking 45 days to fill (target: 21)
example_insights.action: Increase budget 15% AND expand search to remote AND consider Azure candidates for AWS roles
example_insights.impact: Could reduce time to fill by 10-15 days

example_insights.action: Speed up interview process (currently 18 days, compress to 12) AND improve candidate sell (share more about culture, team, projects)
